inclusion.criterion: willing and able to give informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: positive sputum culture result or positive GeneXpert result
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: evidence of RR-TB or MDR-TB by GeneXpert or culture-based DST
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: willing to use effective contraception of women at childbearing age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: chest X-ray compatible with pulmonary TB diagnosis
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: known allergy to any drug of the regimen
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: currently taking or took part in another trial less than three months before study initiation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: abnormal ECG with QT prolongation over 430ms of men while 450 of women
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: critically ill, and in the judgment of the investigator, unlikely to take part in the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: known to be pregnant or breast-feeding
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: severe cardiovascular diseases such as heart failure, hypertension (poor blood pressure control), arrhythmia or post-infarction status
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient A is a 30-year-old male with symptoms of cough, profuse nocturnal sweating and loss of appetite. He has a positive sputum culture for Mycobacterium tuberculosis which are sensitive to first-line TB drugs.
